document_data.mainbody:
Fallenstar Fine Gems was a jewelry shop in Athkatlas rich Gem District in the 14 century DR.
Fallenstar Fine Gems stood across from the Blevynsoar House in the easterly Gem District, clustered in the chaos of buildings north of the Ladycloak Lane and west of Sarbronts Walk.
By the late 14 century DR, Fallenstar, along with a dozen other expensive jewelry stores "made Gem District glitter."
